nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.mix

Class GeometryString<TEdge extends OrientedGeometry<TEdge>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.BaseGeometry<TActual>
      • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.OrientedGeometry<GeometryString<TEdge>>
        • nl.tue.geometrycore.geometry.mix.GeometryString<TEdge>
  • Type Parameters:
    TEdge - class of edges for this geometry
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeometryConvertable<GeometryString<TEdge>>

    public class GeometryString<TEdge extends OrientedGeometry<TEdge>>
extends OrientedGeometry<GeometryString<TEdge>>
    This geometry represents essentially a polyline, but edges need not be line segments.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Creates a geometry string from the provided edges.

      Creates a geometry string from the provided edges.

      • areaSigned

        public double areaSigned()
        Description copied from class: OrientedGeometry
        Compute and return the signed area for this oriented geometry. Positive area lies "right" of the chord from start to end; negative area lies "left" of the chord.
        Specified by:
        areaSigned in class OrientedGeometry<GeometryString<TEdge extends OrientedGeometry<TEdge>>>
        Returns:
        signed area

      • intersect

        public void intersect(BaseGeometry otherGeom,
                      double prec,
                      java.util.List<BaseGeometry> intersections)
        Description copied from class: BaseGeometry
        Compute the intersections between this and the given geometry, using a specified precision. Note that the result must be independent from the input geometry.
        Specified by:
        intersect in class BaseGeometry<GeometryString<TEdge extends OrientedGeometry<TEdge>>>
        Parameters:
        otherGeom - geometry with which intersection should be computed
        prec - precision of the computation
        intersections - list in which to store the intersection
